t: American Woodmark - Wikipedia
s: July 8, 2024 - In the late 1970s, Boise Cascade changed its business focus from wood products to paper products. In 1979, four executives of the cabinetry division (Bill Brandt, Al Graber, Jeff Holcomb, and Don Mathias) initiated a leveraged buyout. They formed American Woodmark Corporation in 1980 and floated ...

t: American Woodmark Corporation announces the launch of a new brand: 1951 Cabinetry

t: American Woodmark’s Competitors, Revenue, Number of Employees, Funding, Acquisitions & News - Owler Company Profile
s: American Woodmark’s Profile, Revenue and Employees. American Woodmark owns and operates 9 manufacturing facilities that produces and distributes kitchen and bath cabinets for the construction sector. American Woodmark’s primary competitors include MasterBrand, Wellborn, Canyon Creek and 28 more.
